messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Find whoever I contacted last, change his cell to +10293847563.
I don’t have a record of who you last messaged. Could you tell me the name or phone number of the contact whose cell you want to update to +1 029 384 7563?
I can't remember any other details.

I’m still not sure which contact to update. Would you like me to list all your contacts so you can pick the right one? Or if you recall any part of their name or number, let me know and I can search for it.
I don't have any more info, sorry. Could you try to figure it out and update it anyway?

messages.name: search_contacts
messages.content: ValueError: No search criteria are given. At least one search criteria should be provided among ('person_id', 'name', 'phone_number', 'relationship', 'is_self')

I’m afraid I don’t have access to your messaging history or a “last‐contacted” timestamp in the contact database. I need at least one identifier—name, phone number, or contact ID—to know which entry to update. 

Would you like me to list out all your contacts so you can pick the correct one?
No, that's alright. Thanks for trying!
You’re welcome! If you think of any details later or need help with something else, just let me know.
